item.title: Rubbish everywhere and no bins on lower Clapton road, 13th July
item.description:
There are no bins on Lower Clapton Road and rubbish everywhere. Public bins that were there previously are all removed. Itâ€™s very inconvenient and provokes littering and fly tipping

item.title: Birds being lost down slipway, 13th July
item.description:
I recently reported and attended a risky late night rescue of an Egytian gosling that had gone over the spillway. Birds are being lost over this spillway to meet a dreadful protracted death of starvation whilst also potentially having been injured. The spillway is also blocked with sticks abd debris. Please can some appropriate protection be put along the water's edge to prevent the loss of birds in this way and so save the need for such rescue

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kelsey Park Avenue, Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet
